title: Jim Cramer says advertising is a 'three-horse race' with Amazon, Alphabet and Facebook
text: "With this latest quarter, they've pretty much become the only game in town," the "Mad Money" host said.

title: Big tech had a strong first quarter. The next one could be much harder
text: As the economic crisis caused by coronavirus unfolded, some investors braced for painful first quarter corporate earnings.

title: Factbox: What to know about Facebook's content oversight board
text: Facebook Inc  on Wednesday announced the first 20 members of its independent oversight board that can overrule the company’s own content moderation decisions. Here are some key facts about how the board will work:

title: Factbox: Who are the first members of Facebook's oversight board?
text: Facebook Inc  on Wednesday named the first members of its independent oversight board, which will be able to overturn the company's decisions on individual pieces of content and recommend policy changes.

title: Facebook names first members of oversight board that can overrule Zuckerberg
text: Facebook Inc's  new content oversight board will include a former head of state, a Nobel Peace Prize laureate and several constitutional law experts and rights advocates in its first 20 members, the company announced on Wednesday.

title: Facebook finally reveals who will serve on its version of a Supreme Court
text: Nearly 18 months after announcing an independent board designed to hold it more accountable in content moderation decisions, Facebook has revealed the first members.

title: Facebook's content oversight board includes former prime minister, Nobel winner
text: The social network named the first 20 members of a board that will review its content moderation decisions.

title: Facebook  judges, journalists and politicians on free speech panel
text: New independent board, which includes ex-Guardian editor, will rule on freedom of expression issues

title: These are the people Facebook put in charge of deciding whether or not to delete controversial posts
text: The board includes a former Prime Minister of Denmark and several former journalists.

title: Elevation Partners' Roger McNamee on the state of Big Tech
text: Roger McNamee, Elevation Partners co-founder and early Facebook investor, joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss how tech companies are navigating the coronavirus pandemic.

title: The 10 Best Stocks to Buy on a Dip in May
text: Coming off a record April, the stock market may start to wobble in May. If it does, consider these strong stocks to buy on the dip.

title: 3 Reasons to Trust Facebook Following the Pandemic
text: Unlike other companies, Facebook has an opportunity to turn the coronavirus into a showpiece marketing its advantages over competing platforms.

title: Discover is Facebook’s new effort to help people access any website in text format
text: Facebook has a new connectivity program called Discover to help those who can’t afford to get online access information on the web. The service, available through mobile web and Android app, allows users to visit any website in text format (no video, images, audio and other elements that eat up large amounts of data) and […]

title: Trump's hostility toward a digital tax could unite Europe to implement one, lawmaker says
text: Disagreements with U.S. President Donald Trump could drive Europe to step up levies on companies like Google and Facebook, a lawmaker told CNBC.
